seller_description: Organic Kombucha [Filtered Water, Kombucha Culture (Yeast and Bacteria Cultures), Organic Black Tea, Organic Green Tea, Organic Cane Sugar, Carbonation], Cold-Pressed Organic Tangerine Juice, Cold-Pressed Organic Passion Fruit Juice, Cold Pressed Organic Orange juice.
review: I’ve been using Health-Ade Kombucha bottles as part of my refrigerator organization system, and they are a lifesaver! The uniform size and design of the bottles make stacking and arranging super easy. Plus, the colorful labels help me identify different spots for my beverages, creating a neat and visually pleasing fridge setup. Although I haven't opened one yet, I can already tell these will bring a touch of sophistication to my beverage collection. A perfect addition for anyone who loves keeping their fridge aesthetically organized!
expected-output: Seller’s Description :The seller describes the product as organic kombucha made with filtered water, kombucha culture (yeast and bacteria), organic teas, cane sugar, carbonation, and cold-pressed juices (tangerine, passion fruit, and orange). It emphasizes being health-focused, organic, and probiotic, designed to promote a “happy gut.”Seller’s Image:The seller’s image showcases a single kombucha bottle with a clear, professional label and nutritional information on the back. The design is sleek and vibrant, highlighting the product's premium quality.Buyer’s ImageThe buyer’s image shows multiple bottles neatly stored in a refrigerator. The bottles match the seller’s image in terms of branding, design, and packaging. The organization indicates careful handling and no apparent issues with the product upon delivery.Positive Irrelevant Review:The review focuses on the aesthetic and organizational value of the bottles within a refrigerator, praising their uniformity and visual appeal. It doesn’t address the taste, health benefits, or any functional claims of the product but highlights a personal, unrelated use.
label: -1 buyers opinion
